item.title: Apache2 Custom Site With Self Signed Certificate
item.description: For this activity, we will use a Debian 12 VM with apache installed. The debian installer gives us an option to install a web server (among other things) during the installation process. In case we need to install apache2 after the machine has booted up, it can be done with apt install apache2. Either way, once you have apache installed, we can go to http://your_server_ip and we’ll get the default apache landing page as show inthe screen grab below.
